channel.title: VMware-35 on IvoBeerens.NL | All about End User Computing, AVD, W365 and Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
channel.description: Recent content in VMware-35 on IvoBeerens.NL | All about End User Computing, AVD, W365 and Infrastructure as Code (IaC)

item.title: VMware ESX/ESXi Update 3 released
item.description: VMware has released Update 3 for ESX/ESXi. This new release of ESX/ESXi 3.5 comes with the following enhancements: Increase number of vCPUs per Core Limit (from 8 to 20) New supported servers, NICs and storage IO controllers New supported Guest Operating Systems … and many more improvements and bug fixes. Please refer to the product release notes for the details on improvements and bug fixes.

item.title: Choosing between SQL 2005 Express or SQL standard/Enterprise for the VC database
item.description: VMware VirtualCenter uses standard the Micrososft SQL Express 2005 database. The statement of VMware is: Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Express is intended to be used for small deployments of up to 5 hosts and 50 virtual machines Microsoft SQL 2005 Expresss supports 1 CPU, 1 GB of RAM and a maximum database size of 4 GB.
